# Coding Terminologies

```{r}
#| label: pcs_list
#| echo: true
#| message: false
#| warning: false
pcs <- lst(
  c = c(0:9, grep("[^IO]", LETTERS, value = TRUE)),
  p = seq2_along(1, c),
  a = 1:7)

pcs
```


```{r}
#| label: hcpcs_list
#| echo: true
#| message: false
#| warning: false
hcpcs <- lst(
  c = c(0:9, grep("[^DINOW-Z]", LETTERS, value = TRUE)),
  p = seq2_along(1, c),
  a = 1:5)

hcpcs
```

## Lookup

```{r}
#| label: lookup
#| echo: true
#| message: false
#| warning: false
look <- \(code, system) {
  
  constants <- system$c
  possible  <- system$p
  
  names(possible) <- constants
  
  unname(possible[splitter(sf_toupper(code))])
}

look("0G9000Z", pcs)

look("99213", hcpcs)
```

## Make Matrix

```{r}
#| label: medtrix
#| echo: true
#| message: false
#| warning: false
medtrix <- \(code, system) {
  
  constants <- system$c
  possible  <- system$p
  axis      <- system$a
  
  m <- matrix(data     = 0L,
              nrow     = length(constants),
              ncol     = length(axis),
              dimnames = list(constants, axis))
  
  x <- look(code, system)
  
  for (i in axis) { 
    m[x[i], i] <- 1L 
    }
  
  return(m)
}
```

**ICD-10-PCS:**

```{r}
#| label: medtrix_pcs
#| echo: true
#| message: false
#| warning: false
medtrix(code = "0G9000Z", system = pcs)
```

**HCPCS (CPT):**

```{r}
#| label: medtrix_hcpcs
#| echo: true
#| message: false
#| warning: false
medtrix(code = "99213", system = hcpcs)
```

# Plot Matrix

```{r}
#| echo: true
#| message: false
#| warning: false
mpcs <- medtrix(code = "0G9000Z", system = pcs)

gpaint_matrix(
  mpcs, 
  highlight_area = mpcs == 1, 
  show_indices = "none",
  graph_title = "ICD-10-PCS Code 0G9000Z"
  ) + 
  theme_solid() + 
  ylim(rev(rownames(mpcs))) + 
  xlim(colnames(mpcs)) + 
  xlab("") + 
  ylab("") +
  theme(
    legend.position = "none",
    axis.text.x = element_text(size = 11),
    axis.text.y = element_text(size = 11),
    axis.ticks.x = element_blank(),
    axis.ticks.y = element_blank())
```
